import React, { useState } from 'react' import MyTitle from '../../MyTitle/MyTitle' const CategoryTask = ({ category, tab, setTab, listItems, setListItem }) => { const [modal, setModal] = useState(false) const clConfigBtn = ['category__configModal'] if (modal) clConfigBtn.push('open') const removeCategory = () => { setTab(listItems[0] || listItems[1]) return setListItem(listItems.filter(e => e === category)) } return (
{category}

) } export default CategoryTask
